title: Cant find this font??? / 'Super Dry', 2 T-Shirts: bold sports script, angular open caps with connectors
author: riceah

comments.content: ugh.. tried to upload the picture.. won't let me
Anybody? Please, will need an answer today for a project!!

I count at least 4 typefaces in your samples. Which one(s) are you interested in?  
Do you need exact matches or just the same style?

I assume you are looking for the Super Dry script, and my suggestion for something similar is Leslie Cabarga's [Casey Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140924071801/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/casey/bold/characters.html). You can see the alternate S (glyph 139) is more like your sample. It's not exact, but at least it's close and Casey even comes with a swash (glyph 133).

- Mike Yanega
yeah.. was looking for teh "super dry" logo in each shirt... first says "super dry", second says "super radio"
